subtasks: PlanPageTransactionDetail: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md for TransactionDetailPage (/transactions/:transactionId)

PlanComponentTransactionHeader: Add test entries for TransactionHeader (Transaction ID, Completed status badge, Date/Time, Creator, Description) and breadcrumb navigation (Home > Transactions > TXN-ID)
PlanComponentBasicInfoSection: Add test entries for BasicInfo section (Date field, Reference ID field, Description field, Transaction Type field - all read-only)

PlanComponentQuantityTransfersAndBatches: Add test entries for QuantityTransfersTable (Source Account with direction icon, Source Amount, Source Batch ID, Destination Account, Destination Amount, Net Transfer; Balanced indicator checkmark; Total Debits/Credits row) and BatchesCreatedTable (Batch ID, Material, Quantity)
PlanPageTransactions: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md for TransactionsPage (/transactions)

PlanComponentTransactionsFilterBar: Add test entries for filters (Date Range picker, Involved Accounts multi-select, Material multi-select, Transaction Type dropdown, Clear Filters button) and search bar (search by ID or description)

PlanComponentTransactionsTable: Add test entries for TransactionsTable (columns: Date sortable, Transaction ID, Description, Accounts affected showing Dr/Cr notation, Materials and amounts; row click navigates to detail; Sort by dropdown; Pagination with Previous/Next/page numbers/rows per page; Showing X of Y results) and New Transaction button
PlanPageBatchDetail: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md for BatchDetailPage (/batches/:batchId)

PlanComponentBatchHeader: Add test entries for BatchHeader (Batch ID, Material name, Account name, Status with green dot, Created date/time, Originating Transaction link, Create New Transaction button)
PlanComponentBatchOverview: Add test entries for BatchOverview (Quantity with large display, Unit, Location, Lot Number, Expiration Date, Quality Grade, Storage Condition)

PlanComponentLineageAndUsageHistory: Add test entries for LineageDiagram (source transaction box, input batches with clickable IDs, output batch, visual flow arrows) and UsageHistoryTable (columns: Date & Time, Transaction ID link, Type, Movement In/Out, Amount, Created Batches with clickable links)
PlanPageMaterialDetail: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md for MaterialDetailPage (/materials/:materialId)
PlanComponentMaterialHeader: Add test entries for MaterialHeader (material name, category, description, unit of measure, Edit Material button, New Batch button, New Transaction button)

PlanComponentAccountsDistribution: Add test entries for AccountsDistribution table (Account Name, Account Type, Quantity, Number of Batches, View Account link; collapsible rows showing batches within each account with Batch ID, Quantity, Unit, Created Date)

PlanComponentAllBatchesAndTransactions: Add test entries for AllBatchesList (filters by Account/Date; columns: Batch ID, Location, Quantity, Created Date, View Lineage link) and TransactionsHistory (filters by Type/Date; columns: Date, Transaction ID, Accounts Involved, Batch References, Quantity Moved)
PlanPageMaterials: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md for MaterialsPage (/materials)
PlanComponentMaterialsToolbar: Add test entries for New Material button (opens create material form/modal) and New Category button (opens create category form/modal)
PlanComponentMaterialsFilterBar: Add test entries for search by name input, Filter by Category dropdown, Filter by Account dropdown, Sort by dropdown (Name A-Z etc)

PlanComponentMaterialsTable: Add test entries for MaterialsTable (columns: Material Name, Category, Unit of Measure, Stock, Actions with View Detail link, Edit link, eye icon, edit icon) and Pagination (Previous/Next, page numbers, showing X of Y items)
PlanPageAccountDetail: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md for AccountDetailPage (/accounts/:accountId)

PlanComponentAccountHeader: Add test entries for AccountHeader (account name, type, status badge, Edit Account button opens edit form, New Transaction button navigates to new transaction pre-filled with account)

PlanComponentTrackedMaterialsTable: Add test entries for TrackedMaterialsTable (columns: Material Name, Category, Unit of Measure, Total Quantity with sum icon, Number of Batches, Actions with View Material in this Account link)
PlanPageAccounts: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md for AccountsPage (/accounts)

PlanComponentAccountCategoryLists: Add test entries for StockAccountsList, InputAccountsList, OutputAccountsList (columns: Account Name, Account Type, Description, Actions with View/Edit/Archive icons)
PlanComponentCreateAccountButton: Add test entries for Create Stock/Input/Output Account buttons (one per category section, opens create form/modal)
PlanComponentAccountRowActions: Add test entries for account row click navigation, View/Edit/Archive action icons, and edit/archive confirmation flows
PlanPageDashboard: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md for DashboardPage (/)
PlanComponentLowInventoryAlerts: Add test entries for LowInventoryAlerts (alert rows with warning/critical severity, View Details links, Dismiss buttons, Reorder buttons)
PlanComponentMaterialsCategoriesOverview: Add test entries for MaterialsCategoriesOverview (category summaries with item counts, material links, View All Categories link)

PlanComponentRecentTransactionsTable: Add test entries for RecentTransactionsTable (columns: Date, Reference, Accounts Affected, Materials & Amounts, Action; View Full Details links; View All Transactions link)
PlanComponentDashboardFiltersAndActions: Add test entries for DateRangeFilter, CategoryFilter dropdown, and NewTransactionButton (opens new transaction page)
